name: Outvaders
description:
Aliens.

We always knew they planned to attack us one day.

The first attack came 1978, above the Atlantic Ocean, where braves soldiers succeed to push back the Space Invaders.

But we knew they would come back.

So, to fight monsters, we built monsters on our own, and decided that this time, we will be the ones to invade them.

A spin off of Space Invaders.

Jam organized by LéoIndieGames

The Team

Lenain "Ekoon" Simon (Game Designer/Director)

Chloe "Azcat" Mathias (Game Programmer/Developer)

Ivan "Iboguane" Bon (Game Artist/Sound Designer)

With the participation of Léo Indie Games

Tracks 

The Cyber Grind - meganeko

Mist of Rage - Noisecream

Trauma Team - Vector Seven 

Faces - A. Yarmak
